items.name: brass knuckles
items.properties: Can be hidden, One Handed, Melee, Small

items.name: dagger
items.properties: Can be hidden, One Handed, Melee, Throwable: 4 Yards, Slashing 1, Small

items.name: pick
items.properties: Can be hidden, One Handed, Melee, Piercing 1, Small

items.name: hand axe
items.properties: One Handed, Melee, Slashing 1, Throwable: 4 Yards

items.name: spear
items.properties: One Handed, Melee, Melee Range: 2 Yards, Thrown Range: 8 yards

items.name: heavy spear
items.properties: Two Handed, Melee, Melee Range: 2 Yards

items.name: bow
items.properties: Two Handed; Ranged; Range: 30 Yards, Can remain in stealth if target was farther than 8 yards away

items.name: revolver
items.properties: One Handed, Ranged, Range: 10 Yards, Close-Range

items.name: shotgun
items.properties: Two Handed, Ranged, Range: 4 yard cone, Close-Range, * - targets in the cone roll “Reflexes” vs your “Ranged Attack” roll. On a success they take no damage.

items.name: antidote
items.description: Cures minor or reduces major poison to minor.

items.name: chain
items.description: A length of chain has 15 “health”. Once its health drops to 0 it breaks. If the chain is moving it has a defense of 12, otherwise its defense is 0.

items.name: clothes: common
items.description: A normal set of clothes most people would wear.

items.name: clothes: fancy
items.description: A set of clothes people would wear to a party or to display wealth.

items.name: clothes: ostentatious
items.description: A set of clothes so fancy you’re dressed like the kings and queens of old.

items.name: flask
items.description: For water, oil, or other liquids.

items.name: grappling hook
items.description: A grappling hook sometimes spelled grapnel

items.name: handcuffs
items.description: Used to bind arm movement for creatures size 1 or smaller. Increase cost by 5 silver per size increase up to size 3.

items.name: hunting trap
items.description: For catching larger animals similar to wolves or bears. You can spend an action point to set up a trap. On triggering the target creature rolls “Reflexes” if they fail it deals 1d6 physical damage. It also causes size 1 creatures to be slowed and creatures ½ or smaller to be immobilized. When setting it you can spend another action point to hide the trap. A trapped creature can spend an action point to roll “Athletics” to get out.

items.name: lantern
items.description: Sheds light in all directions up to 20 yards away.

items.name: magic limiter
items.description: Taking the shape of a silver bracelet with arcane etchings on it. When worn the magic limiter makes any spells that the user casts non-lethal. This effect only applies to spells that are level 4 or lower.

items.name: tool kit
items.description: These are tools your character would find useful on adventures. For fighters it would allow you to make simple items, or repairs to items while away from a workshop. For rogues it would allegedly contain tools for picking locks and disarming traps, ect.

items.name: growth potion
items.description: You Increase one size rating.You also gain minor advantage on all strength based rolls and double your strength when calculating damage rolls. Finally you take a -1 to your defense.

items.name: healing potion
items.description: You heal your healing rate. This effect is instantaneous.

items.name: minor luck potion
items.description: Pick a skill, you have minor advantage with that skill.

items.name: speed potion
items.description: You gain +4 to your movement and +1 to your defense.
